about.title: Who's behind GPUcloud.store?
about.subtitle: GPUcloud.store is built around a simple idea: high-performance infrastructure should be understandable, negotiable, and aligned with your business goals – not just your benchmarks.

text.intro: We are cloud consultants with a global Independent Datacenter network powered by Si Exchange.
text.mission: We sit at the intersection of technical infrastructure, commercial reality, and cross-border networks. That means helping you choose not just the "fastest hardware", but the architecture and partnerships that actually move your roadmap forward.
text.approach: With access to a broad network of independent datacenters and GPU providers, we help you navigate capacity, pricing, and reliability while keeping your teams focused on building products — not chasing hardware.

orchestration.title: Multi-cloud orchestration:
orchestration.text: Evaluate and design setups across major providers and specialized GPU clouds.

hybrid.title: Hybrid implementations:
hybrid.text: Combine on-prem or colocation hardware with cloud capacity in a way that doesn't become operational hell.

sourcing.title: Vendor & hardware sourcing:
sourcing.text: Help you navigate GPU availability, pricing, and trusted partners in independent datacenters worldwide.

alignment.title: Cost & growth alignment:
alignment.text: Translate infra decisions into KPI impact: throughput, latency, margin, and runway.

contact.title: Tell us about your workloads
contact.subtitle: Whether you're fighting GPU scarcity, unpredictable invoices, or a messy multi-cloud setup, we can start with a short, focused conversation.

text.intro: Use the form to outline your current situation: what you're running, where it's running, and what's not working the way it should.
